article_title: Tennessee school district that shut down over funding looks to join BEP lawsuit

article_metadata.description: The superintendent of a tiny school district that shut down temporarily last week over funding problems is revisiting the lawsuit the Hamilton County Department of Education filed against the state over a lack of funding.

og.description: The superintendent of a tiny school district that shut down temporarily last week over funding problems is revisiting the lawsuit the Hamilton County Department of Education filed against the state over a lack of funding.
